underBoss.description: The second-in-command, a mastermind of strategy and keeper of order within the organization.
underBoss.visualDescription: Dressed in a sharp suit that commands respect and fear, the Underboss stands confidently, hand in jacket, hinting at concealed strength.

characters.description: An elite operative skilled in nocturnal missions, utilizing cutting-edge technology to become nearly invisible.
characters.visualDescription: Clad in a high-tech stealth suit with night vision goggles and a silenced sniper.

characters.description: A guardian of peace equipped with the latest defensive technology and crowd control gadgets.
characters.visualDescription: Wearing a suit of modular armor equipped with shields and non-lethal deterrents.

characters.description: A master in unmanned warfare, commanding a fleet of drones for reconnaissance and attack.
characters.visualDescription: Equipped with a lightweight tactical suit and a portable drone command station.

characters.description: An expert in electronic warfare, capable of hacking and disabling enemy systems with ease.
characters.visualDescription: Sporting a utility vest brimming with tools and gadgets, eyes focused behind advanced AR goggles.

characters.description: A covert operative specializing in the use of gadgets and traps to outmaneuver and outsmart the enemy.
characters.visualDescription: Dressed in a sleek, gadget-laden suit, ready to deploy a variety of high-tech traps and tools.

characters.description: A steadfast guardian known for unbreakable defense and strategic prowess on the battlefield.
characters.visualDescription: Clad in heavy, ironclad armor with a towering shield and battle-worn sword.

characters.description: A notorious mercenary with a penchant for high-risk, high-reward missions.
characters.visualDescription: Wears a crimson cloak, with a sly grin, dual daggers at the ready.

characters.description: A wise mage who has mastered the ancient arts, blending magic and knowledge to outwit foes.
characters.visualDescription: Cloaked in an aura of mystery, holding an ornate staff pulsing with arcane energy.

characters.description: A fearsome pirate lord, infamous across the seven seas for his ruthlessness and cunning.
characters.visualDescription: Adorned in a tricorn hat, a hook for a hand, and a gaze as cold as the ocean's depths.

characters.description: A wild wanderer who has forged an unbreakable bond with the beasts of the land.
characters.visualDescription: Carries the look of the wild with furs and bones, with piercing eyes that command the respect of beasts.

characters.description: A Stealthy warrior of the night.
characters.visualDescription: Wears a dark cloak and carries twin blades

characters.description: A gentle soul with Powerful healing abilities.
characters.visualDescription: Radiant attire with a staff that glows with a healing aura

characters.description: An enigmatic guardian of ancient secrets, shrouded in tribal mystique.
characters.visualDescription: Cloaked in a hood adorned with tribal patterns and a face obscured by shadow, carrying arrows on the back, and holding a weapon.

characters.description: A tactical operative skilled in navigating and neutralizing dangerous territories.
characters.visualDescription: Equipped with a tactical helmet, night Vision goggles, and a gas mask. Dressed in combat gear suited for hazardous environments.

characters.description: A fearsome predator from the depths of the Shadow Marshes, known for its lethal venom and terrifying speed.
characters.visualDescription: An imposing figure with a chitinous exoskeleton, multiple eyes that gleam in the dark, and razor-sharp mandibles.
